CustomField.description: Client should be consulted to give the tentative on-hold resume date. This should be mandatorily filled to change the status of the project to "on-hold"
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Client should be consulted to give the tentative on-hold resume date. This should be mandatorily filled to change the status of the project to "on-hold"
CustomField.label: On-hold tentative resume date
